title: Ep. 80 - Reach For The Sun
description:
Today the boys do their best to make sense of the world by discussing the wonders of religion, Zito's back pain, whether or not Todd has a realistic chance in a fight with Steven Seagal, the Women's World Cup and how the United States National Team might be the greatest soccer team ever assembled, the tracball craze that has been taking over the office, cigars, frisbee golf, sobriety, Pat's experiences playing locker room corn hole, darts, cocaine, the Black Crows, and KFC. They also cover the unfortunate circumstances surrounding how the California wild fires started, helicopter rescues, play another round of Fact or Fiction, and close out the show with each member of the crew giving their best advice in just 4 words. It's a fun one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
